trans-unit.source: The <see langword="System.Collections.Concurrent" /> namespace provides several thread-safe collection classes that should be used in place of the corresponding types in the <see cref="N:System.Collections" /> and <see cref="N:System.Collections.Generic" /> namespaces whenever multiple threads are accessing the collection concurrently.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="System.Collections.Concurrent" /> 命名空间提供多个线程安全集合类。当有多个线程并发访问集合时，应使用这些类代替 <see cref="N:System.Collections" /> 和 <see cref="N:System.Collections.Generic" /> 命名空间中的对应类型。

trans-unit.source: However, members accessed through one of the interfaces the current collections implement, including extension methods, are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 但是，通过当前集合实现的实例之一访问的成员（包括扩展方法）不保证是线程安全的，可能需要由调用方同步。
